mapper.select: select v.*,mi.shop_name,mi.shop_logo,ifnull(ve.like_count,0) as likeCount from bu_video v left join bu_video_attention va on v.mcht_id = va.mcht_id left join bu_mcht_info mi on va.mcht_id = mi.id left join bu_video_extend ve on v.id = ve.video_id where va.member_id = #{memberId} and va.del_flag = '0' and va.status = '1' and v.status ='1' and v.del_flag = '0' and mi.status = '1' and mi.del_flag = '0' order by v.audit_time desc limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}

select v.*,mi.shop_name,mi.shop_logo,ifnull(ve.like_count,0) as likeCount from bu_video v left join bu_mcht_info mi on v.mcht_id = mi.id left join bu_video_extend ve on v.id = ve.video_id where v.status = '1' and v.del_flag = '0' and v.isRecommend = '1' and mi.status = '1' and mi.del_flag = '0' order by ifnull(v.seq_no,9999),v.total_weicht desc,v.audit_time desc limit #{pageRequest.offset},#{pageRequest.pageSize}

select v.*,mi.shop_name,mi.shop_logo,ifnull(ve.like_count,0) as likeCount,ifnull(ve.comment_count,0) as commentCount from bu_video v left join bu_mcht_info mi on v.mcht_id = mi.id left join bu_video_extend ve on v.id = ve.video_id where v.del_flag = '0' and v.id = #{videoId}

SELECT v.product_type_id AS type3,pt3.parent_id AS type2,pt2.parent_id AS type1 FROM bu_video v LEFT JOIN bu_product_type pt3 ON v.`product_type_id`=pt3.id AND pt3.del_flag='0' LEFT JOIN bu_product_type pt2 ON pt3.`parent_id`=pt2.id AND pt2.del_flag='0' WHERE v.id = #{videoId}

SELECT v.*,mi.shop_name,mi.shop_logo,ifnull(ve.like_count,0) AS likeCount,ifnull(ve.comment_count,0) AS commentCount FROM () AS vId LEFT JOIN bu_video v ON vId.id=v.id LEFT JOIN bu_mcht_info mi ON v.mcht_id = mi.id LEFT JOIN bu_video_extend ve ON v.id = ve.video_id

select v.*,mi.shop_name,mi.shop_logo,mi.status as shopStatus from bu_member_remind mr left join bu_video v on mr.remind_id = v.id left join bu_mcht_info mi on v.mcht_id = mi.id where mr.remind_type='4' and mr.del_flag='0' and v.del_flag = '0' and mr.member_id=#{memberId} order by mr.id desc limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
